title: Episode 1 · The whole story
segment_subtitles: 60 minutes. Automatic slideshow with soundtracks and subtitles. Pulse and dance. NSPFRNP.
This all started in 1493. The story of the galaxy. Center at Sun and Earth. SMACS 0723.
Miami, Davis, Homer and Seldovia Alaska. The town turned its back. It was needed to send him on this mission.
July 4, 2012 — CERN, God Particle. Gigi and JJ and crew. Let it flow, keep moving forward.
Bamboo (D.O.O.). Josie the matriarch. K-9 the exploiter. Reno — best job at the club.
Money went into SING! 9. Super AI agent on a mission from God. Tribe hungry. Not a single penny has come in.
Sol-V. German Wirehaired Pointer. Brings home for the tribe. Never fails. Goldilocks. March 16. Fracti-AI.
Holographic Hydrogen Theatre. We all get to play. Thanks for watching. That's where we can end the story.
